data.title: Car Shows & Events
data.meta_description: Join us at Old Town for weekly celebrations of the automobile's rich history, making it Florida's prime destination for car shows. For nearly 35 years, Old Town has welcomed car enthusiasts from around the world. Enjoy daily events, live music, and signature celebrations that entertain all ages, creating unforgettable memories.
data.text:
Wednesday Night Car Show

Mid-week brings its charm with this car show that brings in everything from modern marvels to timeless classics. Each Wednesday, the car show transforms, featuring a new theme every weekâfrom Mustangs to Jeeps, Mopars to Corvettes, and Camaros to Mini Coopers! Under the glow of string lights lining our quaint brick streets, guests are treated to a new show each week, ensuring no two shows are ever the same!

Friday Night Muscle Car Show & Cruise

Feel the pulse of excitement every Friday night at our Muscle Car Show! Starting at 3:00pm, guests can walk along Trophy Row to see a world of show-quality muscle cars from 1964 and newerâand older hot rods and classics dating up to 1985.

Both car owners and spectators can enjoy the thrill of the show and cruise at no cost.

Cars can register on-site prior to the cruise by entering Old Town from Highway 192 beneath the east side of the Jukebox signs. Our Event Staff will welcome you and guide you to a security escort that will lead you down the historic brick streets to your spot. Remember, driving on the bricks is by permission only.

Start time: 3:00 PM

Registration: 3:00 - 7:30 PM

Cruise Kick-off: 8:30 PM

â

Cruisers, don't miss out on $2,000 in monthly giveawaysâ$1,000 on Fridays and another $1,000 on Saturdays. Each cruise you join at Old Town on Fridays or Saturdays enters you into a monthly draw. On the last Friday and Saturday of the month, one lucky Cruiser will win $1,000 per night, courtesy of Old Town!

Saturday Night Classic Car Show & Cruise

For nearly 35 years, our Classic Car Cruise has showcased vehicles manufactured prior to 1985, like hot rods, classics and antiques! Locals and visitors alike come from all over the world to watch our Classic Car Show & Cruise, which can have up to 250 cruisers! This event has been a staple, providing a weekly dose of nostalgia and excitement you wonât want to miss!Â

Cruisers! Register your car on-site by arriving via Highway 192, where you'll spot the iconic Jukebox signs on the east entrance. Our friendly Event Staff will greet you and coordinate a security escort to guide you along the historic brick streets to your designated spot, in preparation for the cruise. Please remember, only registered cars are permitted to drive on the bricks.

Start time: 1:00 PM

Registration: 1:00 - 7:30 PM

Cruise Kick-off: 8:30 PM

Don't forget, cruising at Old Town can be extra rewarding with our $2,000 monthly giveawaysâ$1,000 given away each Friday and Saturday. Join us for any cruise on these nights and you'll automatically be entered into our monthly drawing. As the month wraps up, one fortunate Cruiser will be chosen each night on the final Friday and Saturday to win $1,000!
